thread.section_title: Hotel Astra Opera - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect stay
thread.title_full: Perfect stay - Review of Hotel Astra Opera - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: snake_rikita
title: Perfect stay
text:
Their service for the customer was very excellent. They are very kindness and friendly.
They are serving free soft drinks and several kinds of free snack from afternoon to the midnight. The room was very clean and house cleaning staff is very kindness. The location is very convenient to the restaurants and shopping zone.
Room Tip: Luxury room is good See more room tips
